about_the_game:
Get ready to put your pop culture knowledge to the test with Befuddle! This bewitching wordplay game will have you help out B, everyone's favorite witch. You'll be on the edge of your seat as you decode addictive word puzzles inspired by your favorite songs, books, films, and video games.


In Befuddle, players play alone or compete against each other to decipher movies, books, TV shows, video games, or songs that have been transformed into different words. For example: ‘Best Pistol’ is ‘Top Gun’, ‘Cracking Corrupt’ is ‘Breaking Bad’, and ‘Young Women Only Desire Amusement’ is ‘Girls Just Wanna Have Fun’.


If you're in need of some 'me' time, consider having some 'me and B' time with the solo mode; the perfect way to challenge yourself without the competitive element of playing against anyone else.


Befuddle can be played together in the living room using controllers, phones, or online over Twitch, so gather your friends near and far and get solving. With a wide range of genres from different eras, everyone, no matter the age, can get involved!


Prepare to be spellbound! B's powerful magic has transformed your favorite movies, songs, books, video games, and musicals into challenging puzzles that will have you racking your brain for hours on end. Whether you're a seasoned pop culture expert or a newbie, Befuddle has something for everyone.
